attributes.action: South Norwood, SE25 should be given National Park status due the acceptance that we have more lakes than Cumbria
attributes.additional_details: South Norwood Tourist Board would like the Government to grant South Norwood the honour of receiving National Park status on the back of our recent successful promotion that we have more Lakes than the actual Lake District. With the beautiful lakes and surround areas of beauty having National Park status would help our local environment and encourage more people to visit.
